column4: can someone explain please.............................is there any way to block the adds load on my website...i hosted a website on a addfree hosting but they r putting adds on my site.....................so is there any script or any way so that when my page will load it can block those adds.........
no only the browser can block it it the popups are coming from the domain-call
its not ubuntu-related. find out from where the adds are comming (domaincall, wordpress)
